arts.ttl: Villarreal star Dani Parejo reaches historic La Liga milestone
arts.sum: Villarreal star Dani Parejo on Sunday etched his name into the history books of Spanish football. This came courtesy of his latest appearance in the colours of the Yellow Submarine.…

arts.ttl: Villarreal ‘thinking about’ making summer approach for Chelsea central midfielder
arts.sum: Cesare Casadei is attracting interest from two different countries, including Spain’s Villarreal. The La Liga side have hopes of signing the 21-year-old Chelsea midfielder. Since joining the Blues in 2022, the young Italian has struggled to break into the first team. arts.ttl: Villarreal raise asking price for Spain star amid interest
arts.sum: Villarreal managed to hold onto Olympic and Euro 2024 champion Alex Baena over the summer, in spite of him finishing as the leading assist-provider in La Liga last season. That task looks increasingly difficult next summer, with the 23-year-old picking up where he left off last season.
